title: Filter anomalies by Voice only
description: Verify that selecting a Voice filter correctly restricts the anomaly list to show only anomalies matching the selected Voice.

steps.description: Navigate to the anomalies page.
Select a Voice from the mandatory Voice filter dropdown.
Check that the anomaly list refreshes and shows only anomalies associated with the selected Voice.
Verify that anomalies of other Voices are not displayed.

title: Multi-criteria filtering of anomalies
description: Verify that anomalies can be filtered correctly by multiple criteria including Voice, Book, Anomaly Type, and Status.

steps.description: Navigate to the anomalies page.
Select a Voice from the Voice filter dropdown.
Select a Book from the Book filter dropdown.
Select an Anomaly Type from the Type filter dropdown.
Select a Status from the Status filter dropdown.
Check that the displayed anomalies match all selected filter criteria.

title: Anomalies table renders all columns and interactive elements
description: Verify the anomalies table displays all required columns with correct data and the interactive elements function properly.

steps.description: Apply any filter to load anomalies in the list.
Check anomalies table contains columns: code, scripture reference, problematic word, anomaly type, additional info, deviation ratio, status dropdown, and play buttons.
Verify the status column contains a dropdown for quick editing.
Verify play buttons are clickable and respond by playing audio snippets for respective anomalies.

title: Play anomaly audio snippet with word highlighting
description: Verify the mini audio player plays the audio snippet and highlights words in synchronization during playback.

steps.description: Click the play button on an anomaly in the table.
Check the floating mini audio player appears and starts playing the audio snippet.
Verify words in the transcript highlight in real-time synchronized with the audio playback.

title: Audio player verse navigation with auto-advance enabled
description: Verify the audio player next/previous verse navigation works and auto-advance correctly moves to the next anomaly after actions.

steps.description: Enable auto-advance in settings.
Play an anomaly audio snippet.
Perform a status update on the current anomaly.
Check that the next anomaly is automatically loaded and ready for playback.
Use next and previous buttons to navigate between anomalies manually.
Verify correct anomalies load and audio plays accordingly.

title: Manual verse timing correction with multiple step sizes
description: Verify timing correction controls allow start/end time adjustments at steps of 1s, 0.1s, and 0.01s with preview playback reflecting changes.

steps.description: Open the timing correction dialog for an anomaly marked as timing error.
Adjust the start time using 1-second increments.
Check the audio preview plays with the updated start time.
Adjust the end time using 0.1-second increments.
Confirm audio preview updates reflect the new end time.
Fine-tune start or end time using 0.01-second increments.
Verify precise changes are applied and preview is accurate.

title: Prevent overlap conflict during timing correction
description: Verify that timing correction adjustments prevent overlapping with neighboring verses and show appropriate warnings.

steps.description: Attempt to adjust start time to overlap with the previous verse timing.
Verify that the UI prevents or warns user about overlap conflict.
Attempt to adjust end time to overlap with the next verse timing.
Check for appropriate warnings or block on saving conflicting time.

title: Persisting anomaly status updates
description: Verify that updating anomaly status (e.g., to confirmed error or alignment correct) persists changes accurately in the backend.

steps.description: Change the status of an anomaly via the dropdown.
Save or let auto-save complete.
Reload or refresh the page.
Verify the status change persists for the anomaly.

title: Persisting timing corrections after adjustment
description: Verify that manual timing corrections made are saved and reflected upon reloading the anomaly details.

steps.description: Make timing adjustments in the correction dialog and save the changes.
Close and reopen the anomaly details or reload the page.
Verify the adjusted timing values persist and match saved inputs.

title: Manual anomaly creation dialog functionality
description: Verify that the manual anomaly creation dialog appears on demand and successfully creates new anomaly records on submission.

steps.description: Trigger the manual anomaly creation dialog via UI controls.
Confirm the dialog loads with required input fields.
Fill in required anomaly details including scripture reference, type, problematic word, and additional info.
Submit the anomaly creation form.
Verify a new anomaly record is created and listed according to filter criteria.

title: Error handling for invalid filter inputs
description: Verify that the system handles invalid or incompatible filter inputs gracefully without crashing or displaying misleading results.

steps.description: Enter invalid or unsupported values into filter fields if possible.
Verify system does not crash and displays either empty results or validation messages.

title: Quick check playback mode functionality
description: Verify that the quick check playback mode in the audio player plays audio snippets rapidly for efficient anomaly review.

steps.description: Activate quick check playback mode in the mini audio player.
Verify audio snippets play in quick succession without manual intervention.
Confirm word highlighting remains synchronized during quick playback.

title: Status dropdown update reflects immediately in UI
description: Verify that selecting a new status from the anomaly status dropdown updates the UI immediately before backend persistence.

steps.description: Select an anomaly status different from current in the dropdown.
Verify the status field updates visually immediately.
Trigger page refresh and verify the status persists.

title: Handling no anomalies for selected filters
description: Verify system behavior when filters result in no anomalies being displayed.

steps.description: Select filter combinations unlikely to return any anomalies.
Check that the anomalies list is empty and the UI shows an appropriate 'no anomalies found' message.

title: Voice filter mandatory enforcement
description: Verify the Voice filter must be selected before anomalies are displayed and appropriate prompts are shown if not selected.

steps.description: Navigate to anomalies page without selecting a Voice filter.
Verify that anomalies list is not loaded and a prompt or validation message requests the user to select a Voice.
